title: Lighten and brighten low-stock reminder background

requirements.summary: Adjust the low-stock theme tokens so the reminder banner and low-stock row highlights use a lighter/brighter background while keeping readable contrast in light and dark mode.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Dashboard, the low-stock reminder banner background appears visibly lighter/brighter than before.
Low-stock highlighted rows (e.g., the Dashboard inventory table and the low-stock banner table rows) use the updated lighter/brighter background consistently.
Text and icons on top of the updated background remain readable with sufficient contrast in both light mode and dark mode.

file_operations.description: Update the low-stock warning theme tokens (--warning-low-stock and, if needed for borders, --warning-low-stock-foreground) for both :root and .dark so backgrounds used by LowStockBanner, Dashboard table rows, and InventoryPage low-stock rows render lighter/brighter while maintaining readable contrast. Keep changes limited to token values; do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui and do not introduce new non-English user-facing text.
